recipe.name: Slow Cooker Marinara Sauce
recipe.description: A good marinara sauce is an essential for everyone. I love this one because you just dump the ingredients into a slow cooker then leave it to work it's magic. The slow cooking caramelises the sugar in the tomato and creates a depth of flavour you will never get from store bought pasta sauce.
recipeIngredient: 2  cans ((800g/28oz each can) crushed tomatoes (see notes))
1  medium brown onion ((or white or yellow), diced)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker. Set for 6 to 8 hours on low.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker. Set for 6 to 8 hours on low.

recipeInstructions.text: Optional step: Remove bay leaves, then use a handheld blender to puree until smooth (or to your liking).
recipeInstructions.name: Optional step: Remove bay leaves, then use a handheld blender to puree until smooth (or to your liking).

itemListElement.text: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and add pasta.
itemListElement.name: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and add pasta.

itemListElement.text: Heat olive oil in a pan, add garlic and diced onion, cook until translucent then add 2 cups of Marinara Sauce per 500g/1lb of dried pasta.
itemListElement.name: Heat olive oil in a pan, add garlic and diced onion, cook until translucent then add 2 cups of Marinara Sauce per 500g/1lb of dried pasta.

itemListElement.text: Bring sauce to rapid simmer, then add pasta (cooked to just before al dente).
itemListElement.name: Bring sauce to rapid simmer, then add pasta (cooked to just before al dente).

itemListElement.text: Add 1/4 cup of pasta water and cook for 1 to 2 minutes until pasta is al dente and the sauce has thickened and coats the pasta.
itemListElement.name: Add 1/4 cup of pasta water and cook for 1 to 2 minutes until pasta is al dente and the sauce has thickened and coats the pasta.

itemListElement.text: Serves 4 hungry people or 6 normal servings.
itemListElement.name: Serves 4 hungry people or 6 normal servings.
